Title: Seven Twenty Three
Plot: Betty tries her hand at local politics. Don is forced into thinking about the future. Peggy receives a luxurious gift.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sexual references
Writer: Andre Jacquemetton, Maria Jacquemetton, Matthew Wein
GuestStars: Bryan Batt, Mark Moses, Chelcie Ross, Anne Dudek, Abigail Spencer, Kristoffer Polaha
